metadata.title: CVE-2017-16228 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Dulwich before 0.18.5, when an SSH subprocess is used, allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary commands via an ssh URL with an initial dashcharacter in the hostname, a related issue to CVE-2017-9800,CVE-2017-12836, CVE-2017-12976, CVE-2017-1000116, and CVE-2017-1000117.

criterions.comment: dulwich package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
